products.title: Racing Green PerfectFIT Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: This traditional Racing Green colourway has lots of elegant appeal. Whether in a sophisticated setting or a more casual conservatory, it has a mature feel with just a hint of nature.

products.title: Green Tea PerfectFIT Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Much loved, this Cotswold sage colour will team effortlessly with other classic colour tones. Perfect for the conservatory the matt green slat will frame the view to the garden or outside beautifully.

products.title: Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72013. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive Blackout Green Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric.  Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Softest Green PerfectFIT Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: When we say ‘softest green’ we really do mean it, with just a hint of green this gloss venetian blind will look sensational in a conservatory against the backdrop of a garden or outside area.

products.title: Powder Green Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Powder Green Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Limewash Gloss Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: A peppier take on our beige-toned blinds, Limewash is enhanced by its high-gloss finish, for a gentle shine that gives a clean look to your windows. Fitting snug into the window f
products.productdescription: A peppier take on our beige-toned blinds, Limewash is enhanced by its high-gloss finish, for a gentle shine that gives a clean look to your windows. Fitting snug into the window frame, our Perfect Fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows like tilt and turns Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more.

products.title: Pistachio
